aboutPage.title: About Islamic Knowledge Assistant
aboutPage.missionDescription: The Islamic Knowledge Assistant is designed to provide accessible Islamic education and guidance to Muslims around the world. Our goal is to make authentic Islamic knowledge available to everyone, regardless of their location or background.
aboutPage.whatWeOfferDescription: Our AI-powered assistant can help you with various aspects of Islamic knowledge, including:
aboutPage.preciseGroundingDescription: Our AI assistant is built upon a comprehensive foundation of authentic Islamic sources, ensuring accuracy and reliability in every response. We draw from:
aboutPage.risaleNurCollection: The complete Risale-i Nur Collection by Bediuzzaman Said Nursi, including Sözler, Mektubat, Lemalar, and specialized treatises like Kader Risalesi, İhlas Risaleleri, and Tabiat Risalesi
aboutPage.classicalHanafi: Classical Hanafi jurisprudence texts such as Raddul-Muhtaar, Fatawa Qazi Khan, Fatuhat-i Alamgiri, and Sharh al-Wiqayah
aboutPage.sadrAlShariah: Works by Sadr al-Shari'ah and other renowned classical scholars
aboutPage.hadithCollections: Authentic Hadith collections (Sahih Bukhari, Sahih Muslim, and other reliable compilations)
aboutPage.tafsirWorks: Classical Tafsir works and contemporary scholarly interpretations
aboutPage.urduTexts: Urdu classical texts like Badai as-Sanai and other trusted sources
aboutPage.youtubeChannels: Content from verified YouTube channels of reputable Islamic scholars and educators
aboutPage.groundingConclusion: Every answer is grounded in these verified sources, providing you with knowledge that is both authentic and traceable to its original Islamic foundations. Our collection spans from classical 13th-century texts to modern scholarly works, ensuring comprehensive coverage of Islamic knowledge.
aboutPage.multilingualDescription: Our AI breaks down language barriers to make Islamic knowledge accessible to Muslims worldwide. Key features include:
aboutPage.askInAnyLanguage: Ask questions in any language - English, Arabic, Urdu, Turkish, Indonesian, French, Russian, and many more
aboutPage.receiveInPreferred: Receive answers in your preferred language, regardless of the source language
aboutPage.accessSources: Access to sources in Arabic and Urdu with seamless translation to English, Russian, or your chosen language
aboutPage.preserveAuthenticity: Preserve the authenticity of original texts while providing clear translations
aboutPage.culturalContext: Cultural context adaptation to help you understand concepts in your local context
aboutPage.multilingualConclusion: Whether the original source is a classical Arabic text or a modern Urdu lecture, you can easily read and understand it in English, Russian, or any other supported language, making authentic Islamic knowledge truly global and accessible.
aboutPage.disclaimerText: While we strive to provide accurate and helpful information, this service is for educational purposes only. For important religious decisions, rulings, or guidance, we strongly recommend consulting with qualified Islamic scholars, local Imams, or religious authorities in your community.
aboutPage.commitmentDescription: We are committed to providing respectful, accurate, and beneficial Islamic knowledge while maintaining the highest standards of Islamic ethics and values. We continuously work to improve our service and ensure it serves the Muslim community effectively.
aboutPage.communityDescription: This service is built for the global Muslim community. We welcome feedback and suggestions to help us better serve your needs and improve the quality of Islamic education we provide.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.informationCollectText: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our chat service, or contact us for support. This may include your name, email address, and chat conversations.
privacyPage.howWeUseText: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our Islamic Knowledge Assistant service, respond to your questions, and communicate with you about our service.
privacyPage.informationSharingText: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties. Your chat conversations are private and are not shared with others unless you explicitly choose to make them public.
privacyPage.dataSecurityText: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacyPage.cookiesText: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, remember your preferences, and analyze how our service is used.
privacyPage.changesText: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page.
privacyPage.contactText: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us through our contact page.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.getInTouchText: We value your feedback and are here to help. If you have questions, suggestions, or need support with the Islamic Knowledge Assistant, please don't hesitate to reach out to us.
contactPage.supportText: For technical support, questions about using the service, or reporting issues, please contact our support team. We strive to respond to all inquiries within 24-48 hours.
contactPage.feedbackText: Your feedback helps us improve the Islamic Knowledge Assistant. Whether you have suggestions for new features, improvements to existing functionality, or ideas for better serving the Muslim community, we'd love to hear from you.
contactPage.contentConcernsText: If you notice any content that seems inaccurate or inappropriate, please let us know immediately. We take the accuracy and appropriateness of Islamic content very seriously and will investigate all reports promptly.
contactPage.partnershipText: We welcome partnerships with Islamic organizations, scholars, and educational institutions. If you're interested in collaborating to improve Islamic education and outreach, please reach out to discuss opportunities.
contactPage.responseTimeText: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24-48 hours during business days. For urgent matters, please indicate the urgency in your message subject line.
contactPage.noteText: For immediate religious guidance or urgent spiritual matters, please contact your local mosque, Islamic center, or qualified religious scholar in your community.
